dc:title: On Pilgrimage - April 1956
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tells the story of their travails with the city courts after being fined for operating "a fire trap." Reaffirms personal responsibility as the way to care for the poor, decrying "Holy Mother the State's" taking over such care.
